import React from 'react'; import { Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import styles from "./Weather.module.scss"; import DefaultWeather from "../Svgs/DefaultWeather"; import Thermometer from "../Svgs/Thermometer" import Wind from "../Svgs/Wind" import {TfiTime } from "react-icons/tfi"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export const Weather = () => { const weather = useSelector((state) => state.Weather); console.log(weather) return ( <> {JSON.stringify(weather)} {weather.name} , {weather.sys.country}
Monday ,01:55 AM
{weather.main.feels_like}°C
Good Morning {weather.name}
Sunrise
{weather.sys.sunrise}
Wind
{weather.wind.speed} m/s
Temp
35°C
 ); };
